metadata.title: Cat Coffee Teaspoons, 6pcs Stainless Steel Teaspoon Colorful Coffee Spoon Cute Kitchen Utensil for Stirring/Mixing/Dessert/Ice Cream Spoon, Perfect Gifts for Coffee Lover

Unique Design: These coffee spoon are designed of different cats patterns,different colors simple and delicate appearance perfectly matched with your cutlery and cups.

100% Satisfaction Guarantee: KONTEL cat teaspoon make life better.Your Satisfaction is 100% Guaranteed! If any problems and concerns, pls feel free to contact us. We offer you solution and promise.
